00018         {

00020                 {

00023                         
00024                         $this->before_filter(array('block_ip', 'log_visit'));

00031                 function diario()
00032                 {
00033                         if (!this->request->is_post())
00034                         {
00035                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'read', 'id' => $_REQUEST['id']));
00036                         }
00037                         
00038                         $trackback = new TrackBack('Emeraldion Lodge .o. Diario', 'claudio');
00039                         
00040                         $pingback = new DiarioPingback();
00041 
00042                         $pingback->post_id = $trackback->get_id; // The id of the item being trackbacked
00043                         $pingback->url = $trackback->url; // The URL from which we got the trackback
00044                         $pingback->title = $trackback->title; // Subject/title send by trackback
00045                         $pingback->excerpt = $trackback->excerpt; // Short text send by trackback                       
00046                         
00047                         if ($pingback->save())
00048                         {
00049                                 // Logged successfully...
00050                                 echo $trackback->receive(TRUE);
00051                         }
00052                         else
00053                         {
00054                                 // Something went wrong...
00055                                 echo $trackback->receive(FALSE, l('Trackbacks are currently disabled'));
00056                         }
00057                         exit();
00058                 }
00059                 
00064                 public function software()
00065                 {
00066                         if (!this->request->is_post())
00067                         {
00068                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'show', 'id' => $_REQUEST['id']));
00069                         }
00070                         
00071                         $trackback = new TrackBack('Emeraldion Lodge .o. Software', 'claudio');
00072                         
00073                         $pingback = new SoftwarePingback();
00074 
00075                         $pingback->software_id = $trackback->get_id; // The id of the item being trackbacked
00076                         $pingback->url = $trackback->url; // The URL from which we got the trackback
00077                         $pingback->title = $trackback->title; // Subject/title send by trackback
00078                         $pingback->excerpt = $trackback->excerpt; // Short text send by trackback                       
00079                         
00080                         if ($pingback->save())
00081                         {
00082                                 // Logged successfully...
00083                                 echo $trackback->receive(TRUE);
00084                         }
00085                         else
00086                         {
00087                                 // Something went wrong...
00088                                 echo $trackback->receive(FALSE, l('Trackbacks are currently disabled'));
00089                         }
00090                         exit();
00091                 }
00092                 
00097                 protected function require_post()
00098                 {
00099                         if (!$this->request->is_post())
00100                         {
00101                                 HTTP::error(405, array('Allow', 'POST'));
00102                         }
00103                 }
